pullrequest.title: Performance: Delete / insert models as we need them in view

content.raw:
Sorry, I hadn't updated `unique_task3.world.`. Now it has the fix too.

It's surprising to me though that task3 is the slowest one for you. On my machine, I get about the following average RTF after 3 minutes of Val standing in place:

* Task 1: 0.32
* Task 2: 0.19
* Task 3 (without this PR): 0.23
* Task 3 (with this PR): 0.31
content.html:
Sorry, I hadn't updated unique_task3.world.. Now it has the fix too.

It's surprising to me though that task3 is the slowest one for you. On my machine, I get about the following average RTF after 3 minutes of Val standing in place:

  • Task 1: 0.32
  • Task 2: 0.19
  • Task 3 (without this PR): 0.23
  • Task 3 (with this PR): 0.31
